alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Watch issued January 15 at 2:48AM CST until January 17 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST TUESDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26. For the second Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 24 expected. For the Hard Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 23 possible. * WHERE...Webb County. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, until noon CST today. For the second Freeze Warning, from 10 PM this evening to noon CST Tuesday. For the Hard Freeze Watch, from Tuesday evening through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
